Accordion.name: basic
Accordion.description: Basic accordion with single open item
Accordion.razor:
<Accordion>
    <AccordionItem>
        <AccordionTrigger>Is it accessible?</AccordionTrigger>
        <AccordionContent>Yes. It follows WAI-ARIA patterns.</AccordionContent>
    </AccordionItem>
    <AccordionItem>
        <AccordionTrigger>Is it styled?</AccordionTrigger>
        <AccordionContent>Yes. Styled with Tailwind CSS.</AccordionContent>
    </AccordionItem>
</Accordion>

Select.name: basic
Select.razor:
<Select @bind-Value="selected" Items="items" />

@code {
    string selected = string.Empty;
    List<SelectOption<string>> items =
    [
        new SelectOption<string>("apple", "Apple"),
        new SelectOption<string>("banana", "Banana"),
        new SelectOption<string>("cherry", "Cherry")
    ];
}

Select.name: declarative
Select.razor:
<Select @bind-Value="selected">
    <SelectItem Value="apple">Apple</SelectItem>
    <SelectItem Value="banana">Banana</SelectItem>
    <SelectItem Value="cherry">Cherry</SelectItem>
</Select>

@code {
    string selected = string.Empty;
}
